name: Hungry Monster (JOrbits)
description:
Hungry Monster

DISCLAMER: I felt bad on the second day of the jam. Tiredness mixed with headache, therefore this game is obvisouly not finished, there is no sound and the polishing is not done. I hope you'll still have fun playing it. Thanks for checking it out.

The idea of the game was, that you have to sacrifice small minions to keep the monster alive. Sadly there is no goal or threat, just have fun with it though!
